title: # 441 - Corey Taylor & ME
description:
Today I sit down with the lead singer of Slipknot & Stone Sour, Corey Taylor. We talk about why he quit drugs/alcohol, the old music business vs the new music business, horror movies, fame, the story behind the Slipknot masks, his new solo album, and much more! 

 

Corey’s new solo album “CMFT” is available now wherever you get your music! 

 

This episode is brought to you by Established Titles. Buy one title and get one free with the discount code “BLACKFRIDAY”. Go to http://www.EstablishedTitles.com to become a Lord today!

 

This episode is also brought to you by Whoop. Go to http://www.Whoop.com and use the Code “Bert” at checkout to get your first month free. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Fiverr. Go to https://www.fiverr.com and use code “Bertcast” for 10% off your first order.

 

This episode is also brought to you by SkyLight Frames. Get $10 off your purchase of a Skylight Frame when you go http://www.SkylightFrame.com and enter code “BERT” 

 

This episode is also brought to you by DHM Detox. Get 30% off your order and free shipping in the US. Just head over to http://www.NoDaysWasted.CO/BERT30 and use promo code "BERT30” at checkout.

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com 

Twitter: http://www.Twitter.com/bertkreischer 

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer
